name: ROBO THE BUILDER
description:
I made ROBO THE BUILDER

it was my  first game ever I liked the process a lot and I have learned a lot of new skills. I am only thirtheen years old and I know I am not the best programmer/artist so be alittle bit kind in the comments.

in my game the less blocks means the more points.

Please play on full-screen mode to get the best experience.

the controlls:

a,d or the left and right arrow keys to move

the spacebar to jump

f to switch between building and running
